name: Riki
title: Stealth Assassin
lore: The last of his tribe, Riki uses stealth and cunning to strike from the shadows.

smokeScreen.name: Smoke Screen
smokeScreen.description: Creates a cloud of smoke that silences enemies and causes them to miss attacks.

blinkStrike.name: Blink Strike
blinkStrike.description: Teleports to a target and attacks them from behind with bonus damage.

cloakAndDagger.name: Cloak and Dagger
cloakAndDagger.description: Riki is permanently invisible and deals bonus backstab damage.

tricksOfTheTrade.name: Tricks of the Trade
tricksOfTheTrade.description: Riki phases out and attacks all enemies in an area with backstab damage.

25: Cloak and Dagger Doesn't Reveal on Attack
